name: Code Documentation SLM with Reinforcement Learning
short_summary: Fine-tuned a Small Language Model (SLM) to act as a Code Documentation SME, using GRPO reinforcement learning to induce reasoning.
long_summary: Developed a specialized SLM that functions as a Subject Matter Expert for code documentation. The model was fine-tuned using advanced Reinforcement Learning (GRPO) to generate high-quality, human-like documentation that explains functionality, usage, and logic by analyzing a given codebase.

name: Genesis: AI-Powered Automated Unit Testing
short_summary: A multi-agent system that automates unit testing for Python, C++, and Angular, deployed as a microservice on AWS EC2.
long_summary: Engineered a multi-agent system to automate the entire unit testing lifecycle across diverse codebases (Python, C++, Angular). Deployed as a scalable microservice on AWS EC2, Genesis significantly boosts QA tester productivity and optimizes the SDLC process.

name: GraphGPT: Big Data & GraphRAG Pipeline
short_summary: A Big Data pipeline using PySpark to process warehouse data into SQL and Neo4j, enabling interactive querying via a GraphRAG system.
long_summary: Designed and implemented a full data pipeline (GraphGPT) to process large-scale warehouse data. Utilized PySpark for transformation, storing structured data in SQL and graph relationships in Neo4j. The system is equipped with a GraphRAG interface for advanced, interactive analytics.

name: Comprehensive LLM Evaluation System
short_summary: An automated system to evaluate the RAG and Agentic capabilities of LLMs using synthetically generated data and 10+ performance metrics.
long_summary: Built an end-to-end LLM evaluation pipeline that synthetically generates articles, questions, and ground truth answers. It then rigorously tests an LLM's RAG and agentic performance, scoring it across a suite of over 10 metrics including ROUGE, BLEU, Perplexity, Coherence, and LLM-as-a-Judge.

name: Spotlight AI: Multi-Agent Video Analysis
short_summary: A Multi-Agent System using CrewAI for automated face recognition, video processing, and intelligent media analysis.
long_summary: Engineered a multi-agent system featuring a Face Recognition Agent to identify individuals in media and a Video Processing Agent to automate editing tasks like highlight creation and scene trimming. The system leverages CrewAI for intelligent, automated media analysis, applicable to security and content creation.

name: AutoCogni: Autonomous Computer Agent
short_summary: An autonomous agent using vision and reasoning to automate computer tasks in a perceive-reason-act loop.
long_summary: Developed an autonomous agent that automates computer tasks by observing the screen, reasoning about next steps, and executing actions with Playwright. The agent's stateful, cyclical logic is managed by LangGraph, and it features persistent, cloud-based memory via Mem0.ai for continuous learning across tasks.

name: MedSynth: GAN for Medical Image Augmentation
short_summary: Improved brain tumor classification by augmenting an image dataset with Deep Conditional GANs and fine-tuning a ResNet50 model.
long_summary: Utilized Deep Conditional Generative Adversarial Networks (DC-GANs) to expand a brain tumor image dataset, enhancing its diversity. Conducted a comparative analysis by fine-tuning a ResNet50 architecture on pre- and post-augmentation data, demonstrating significant improvements in classification accuracy, sensitivity, and model robustness.

name: Real-time American Sign Language (ASL) Translator
short_summary: A real-time ASL translator using OpenCV for gesture recognition and IBM Watson for text-to-speech conversion.
long_summary: Developed a system to address a real-world communication challenge by translating American Sign Language in real-time. The application uses OpenCV and machine learning to achieve high accuracy in recognizing a wide range of ASL gestures, then integrates with IBM Watson's text-to-speech engine to convert the recognized gestures into spoken words.
